meanings.definition: Not classified or ranked according to quality or grade.
meanings.sent1: The teacher handed out ungraded worksheets for practice.
meanings.sent2: The ungraded assignments were used to help students improve.
meanings.sent3: The ungraded papers flew around the classroom, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her ungraded artwork was like a hidden gem waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The ungraded tests left the students uncertain about their progress.

meanings.definition: Not evaluated or assessed for quality or performance.
meanings.sent1: She submitted an ungraded project for the competition.
meanings.sent2: The ungraded essays will be reviewed by the teacher next week.
meanings.sent3: The ungraded experiment resulted in a surprising outcome.
meanings.sent4: His ungraded skills were a mystery to his classmates.
meanings.sent5: The ungraded presentation lacked feedback for improvement.
